Params: {1: 'Eternal Engine', 2: 'Chapter 10', 3: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Atlas/CommonLogo/BgLogo1.png'}
{1: 'ThemeEnable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg1001_5.jpg'}
{3: 'I stare up at the sky, as all the others do.'}
{3: 'Even if you have the power to run forever on the ground, it all just gets tiring in the end.'}
{3: '"Only the sky is safe."'}
{3: 'Blinding, blazing, deafening. Plummeting down from the heavens, unwavering, unstoppable.'}
{3: 'It lights up the night sky and every one of our expressions.'}
{3: 'It is our hope, the answer to our prayers, and the bringer of an uncertain future.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'The spark descends closer and closer, gracing everyone with its presence. Finally, it lands on the designated spot.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg1001_2.jpg'}
{3: 'The loud crash shocks everything in its vicinity, but that anxiousness and fear did not reach this area.'}
{3: 'Everything is still and quiet, with a whiff of sweetness.'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Leader, Changyu and I are ready.'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Before that, Aston, is the deal with the Forsaken and the others done?'}
{2: 'Aston', 3: 'All is ready.'}
{2: 'Aston', 3: "It's a shame that Construct numbers are limited, but it should be enough for basic defenses."}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Good...'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Sophia, do you know what we are doing next?'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Obtain the merchandise and make a deal.'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "It may not be the noble way for a merchant to obtain merchandise by themselves, but there won't be a deal if we don't have merchandise in the first place."}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'The goal of making a deal is to generate a larger profit, and as merchants, we always choose the option with a higher risk.'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Yes, Leader, I will remember that.'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Soon...'}
{3: 'Jamilah silently stares forward and lifts her hand, as if reaching out for something unseen.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Very, very soon...'}
